[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: version_migrate()] [State Inconsistency] Does version_migrate() only update storage.version without migrating actual data structures, causing old reserve data to be incompatible with new version logic expectations? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: version_verification()] [Bypass Path] Can an attacker deploy a fork of Storage with manipulated version field to bypass version_verification() checks in all functions, avoiding migration requirements? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: version_migrate()] [Downgrade Attack] Is there protection against version downgrade where storage.version is decreased to re-enable deprecated vulnerable code paths in older lending_core::logic implementations? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: version_verification()] [Missing Validation] Does version_verification() fail to check if storage.version exceeds maximum supported version, allowing future-incompatible versions to interact with current logic? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Lines: 145-147] [Pre-check Timing] Can version_verification() using pre_check_version() be bypassed if version module is upgraded between pre_check and actual function execution, creating TOCTOU vulnerability? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: init_reserve()] [Overflow Attack] Can reserves_count overflow from u8 max (255) back to 0 when adding 256th reserve, causing reserve ID collision where new reserve overwrites reserve at index 0? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: init_reserve()] [Type Collision] Does reserve_validation() checking coin_type string equality allow different generic types with identical string representations to create duplicate reserves, breaking uniqueness assumption? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: reserve_validation()] [DOS Attack] Can an attacker initialize 255 reserves to hit max_number_of_reserves() limit, preventing legitimate reserve additions and blocking protocol expansion? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: init_reserve()] [Oracle Manipulation] Can oracle_id be set to arbitrary value (including duplicates across reserves) during init_reserve(), causing price feed collisions where multiple assets share same oracle and get incorrect pricing? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: init_reserve()] [Percentage Overflow] Does percentage_ray_validation() on line 182-190 allow values exactly equal to ray() (1e27), and can subsequent ray_mul operations overflow when multiplying validated percentages together? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: init_reserve()] [Index Initialization] Are current_supply_index and current_borrow_index initialized to ray() (1e27) safe for immediate ray_div operations, or can zero total_supply cause division by zero in first interest accrual? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: init_reserve()] [Cap Validation Missing] Is supply_cap_ceiling validated to be non-zero and reasonable, or can it be set to u256::max() allowing unlimited deposits that break risk management assumptions? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: init_reserve()] [Rate Parameter Conflict] Can base_rate + (multiplier * utilization) + (jump_rate_multiplier * excess) overflow u256 when all factors are set to maximum validated values near ray()? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: init_reserve()] [Liquidation Math Error] Can liquidation_bonus + liquidation_ratio exceed 100% (ray()), allowing liquidators to receive more than collateral value and drain protocol reserves? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: init_reserve()] [LTV vs Threshold] Is ltv validated to be strictly less than liquidation_threshold, or can ltv >= threshold allow immediate liquidation upon borrowing, griefing all borrowers? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: init_reserve()] [Timestamp Manipulation] Can clock::timestamp_ms(clock) be manipulated if clock object is attacker-controlled, setting last_update_timestamp to future/past values that break interest rate calculations? [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: init_reserve()] [Pool Creation Race] Can pool::create_pool() fail while reserve is already added to storage.reserves table, leaving orphaned reserve data without corresponding Pool object? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: init_reserve()] [Decimal Mismatch] Does pool decimals from coin_metadata align with protocol's internal ray (1e27) decimals, or can mismatch cause precision loss in normal_amount/unnormal_amount conversions? [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: init_reserve()] [Reserved Fields Risk] Are reserve_field_a, reserve_field_b, reserve_field_c initialized to zero safe if future versions expect non-zero defaults, causing migration issues? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: reserve_validation()] [Type Name Spoofing] Can malicious CoinType implement custom type_name that returns existing reserve's coin_type string to bypass duplicate check in reserve_validation()? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: init_reserve()] [Isolated Reserve Exploit] Can is_isolated=true reserves be borrowed against non-isolated collateral to bypass isolation restrictions in lending_core::logic, breaking debt isolation guarantees? [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: set_supply_cap()] [No Cap Decrease Protection] Can supply_cap_ceiling be decreased below current total supply, trapping existing depositors who cannot withdraw without violating the new cap? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: set_borrow_cap()] [Utilization Shock] Can borrow_cap_ceiling be lowered from 100% to 1% while high utilization exists, causing immediate violation and potential mass liquidation trigger? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: set_ltv()] [Instant Liquidation] Can ltv be reduced from 80% to 50% while users have 70% LTV positions, instantly making them liquidatable without grace period to add collateral? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: set_treasury_factor()] [Fee Front-running] Can treasury_factor be increased from 10% to 90% just before large interest accrual, capturing majority of earned interest as treasury fees instead of supplying users?
